name: Radgirl!
description:
---MAKE SURE YOU ARE ON FULLSCREEN!---

This prototype aims to be a very mechanically complex and rewarding platformer, 

Click here to see a level showcase

Currently Radgirl has a few mechanics:

walk/jump -> WASD 

slide -> Shift + walk

ledge grab -> automatically activated when falling near a ledge

magical swing -> when Space key is pressed radgirl will shot a magical spell towards the closest active swing ball

wall climb ->  still being worked on!

while radgirl moves in the world, velocity will be conserved between events and animations, rewarding players for smart movement
